description:
Hanami Yuzuka is a girl who becomes a magical girl after meeting http://anidb.net/ch78241 [Miton]. After she transforms, she is in the swimsuit, much to her chagrin and embarrassment. She allows Miton to accompany her but repulses his attempt for intimate interactions. She is serious in studying and good at cooking, unlike many magical girls that Miton knew before.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hanami Yuzuka
